amendment.description: To amend the Professional Boxing Safety Act of 1996.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4074 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4074 proposed by Senator McCain. (consideration: CR S11683) To amend the Professional Boxing Safety Act of 1996.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4074 proposed by Senator McCain.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4074 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
